amendment.description: To eliminate the application of an asset test for purposes of eligibility for premium and cost-sharing subsidies for low-income beneficiaries.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 933 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 933 proposed by Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S8111-8112, S8115-8116; text: CR S8111) To eliminate the application of an asset test for purposes of eligibility for premium and cost-sharing subsidies for low-income beneficiaries.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 933 proposed by Senator Bingaman.
